tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE manufacturing_process_inspection (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    non_conforming_product BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE non_conforming_products (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   product_name VARCHAR(255),
   non_conforming_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   inspection_date DATE,
   inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
   product_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES non_conforming_products(id)
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
   process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   process_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   product_name VARCHAR(255),
   process_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_processes(process_id)
)

CREATE TABLE non_conforming_products (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  manufacturing_process_id INT,
  reason VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (manufacturing_process_id) REFERENCES manufacturing_process(id)
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  result VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (inspector_id) REFERENCES inspectors(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id)
);
